Registry of Open Data on AWS

GEOS-Chem Input Data

air quality climate environmental meteorological sustainability weather

Description

Input data for the GEOS-Chem Chemical Transport Model. Including the NASA/GMAO MERRA-2 and GEOS-FP meteorological products, the HEMCO emission inventories, and other small data such as model initial conditions.

Update Frequency

New meteorological and emission data will be added when available.

License

http://acmg.seas.harvard.edu/geos/geos_licensing.html

Documentation

http://cloud-gc.readthedocs.io

Contact

http://acmg.seas.harvard.edu/geos/

Usage Examples

Tutorials
  • Tutorial on accessing GEOS-Chem data bucket in S3 by Jiawei Zhuang
Publications
  • Overview of the GEOSChem-on-cloud project by Atmospheric Chemistry Modeling Group, Harvard University
  • Running GEOS-Chem on Cloud Computing Platforms, presented at the 8th International GEOS-Chem Meeting by Jiawei Zhuang, et al.
  • Enabling Immediate Access to Earth Science Models through Cloud Computing: Application to the GEOS-Chem Model by Jiawei Zhuang, et al.

Resources on AWS

  • Description
    Top-level directory for all GEOS-Chem data.
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::gcgrid
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://gcgrid/ --no-sign-request
